## slu mail send-vault

Send mail (with credentials from vault)

```
slu mail send-vault [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for send-vault
  -m, --message string   email message ("-" for stdin)
  -s, --subject string   Email subject
  -t, --to string        to (john@acme.com)
```
